detailedDescription: Helical’s latest flagship scheme is the extensive redevelopment of 100 New Bridge Street. The building is designed to meet the needs of today’s leading occupiers, offering top-tier environmental and wellness credentials. Featuring 9,700 sq ft of terraces with stunning views of St. Paul’s Cathedral, it stands as a premier, best-in-class development. 100 New Bridge Street is located on the western side of the City of London, an area known for its historic and financial significance. The building is positioned close to several major landmarks, including St Paul’s Cathedral, Blackfriars Bridge and the River Thames, making it an attractive spot for professionals and visitors alike. 9,700 sq ft of terraces Double height reception Net Zero carbon building Market leading SMART technology 347 cycle storage spaces and visitor bike parking Luxury changing rooms EPC A *targeted

Paradise is a new six-storey office building with a timber structure that locks away c.60 years of tenant operating emissions, setting a new standard for sustainable workspace. The best possible carbon choice for you and your people. Located in the heart of Lambeth with direct access to numerous landmarks, abundant green open spaces with sporting facilities, a wide spectrum of well-known office occupiers, and an excellent range of residential accommodation. All within a 15 minute walk: 6 fitness facilities, 5 green spaces, 10 galleries, 23 restaurants and 16 bars. 250m2 of PV panels + zero carbon electricity Air conditioning (occupational density 1 person per 8 sq. m BREEAM 2018 Outstanding (targeted) Showers / lockers / extensive bicycle storage CO2 detectors within the office spaces to ensure good air quality Life cycle carbon 543kg CO2e/sqm vs RIBA 2030 target of 750kg CO2e/sqm Completed in April 2025 EPC: A

Arbor is a new office building in the centre of Bankside Yards, a £2.5 billion development by Native Land that completes the exciting regeneration of Thames South Bank. Arbor’s dramatic ‘mega-frame’ steel industrial design provides epic volume with superb public spaces. Arbor is designed as a fully electric building with solar panels and high-tech triple glazing. There are terraces on every other floor from level 4 upwards. Arbor forms a part of Bankside Yards, a £2.5bn billion destination development that completes the exciting regeneration of South Bank. This is a new Riverside sanctuary. Arbor benefits from outstanding transport links and unique on site amenities with new retail, restaurants and leisure due to be delivered within the historic railway arches. 1:8 occupational density 327 bicycle spaces/27 showers/327 lockers Private terraces on every other floor 2.91m floor to ceiling heights Carbon Zero in operation 5* wellness space on lower ground floor Charging ports for ebikes and scooters WELL – platinum Wired Score Platinum BREEAM: Excellent EPC: A (24)

Tower 42 is a landmark building, offering 324,000 sq ft of high-quality office space spread over 42 floors in the heart of the City of London. T42 has a Platinum Wired Score Certification for ‘best-in-class’ internet infrastructure. www.tower42.com Tower 42 lies on the east side of Old Broad Street, amongst the City high rise cluster, within close proximity of The Bank of England and The Royal Exchange. Bank (Central and Northern Line), Moorgate (Northern, Circle, Metropolitan, Hammersmith and City lines) and Liverpool Street (Northern & Central) Underground and Mainline stations are just a short walk away. The Elizabeth Line (Crossrail) will be available from both Liverpool Street and Moorgate stations once open. All inclusive “Plug and Play” terms or Cat A with high quality fit out Lease flexibility available from 12 months + Highly efficient column free floor plates Fully air conditioned & raised floor N+1 power resilience Cycle racks and showers 19 x 18 person lifts 24 hour access and security WiredScore Platinum EPC: B (46)

The part 4th floor of International House is the most recent refurbishment on the successful St Katharine Dock Estate. With a rare triple aspect, genuine industrial character and stunning views over both the Marina and the Tower of London, the part 4th floor will appeal to a range of occupiers. International House itself is a showcase of intelligent design meets industrial heritage. The expansive reception with feature timber reception desk is genuinely ‘activated’ by the well used coffee shop and breakout space on the Marina side. The end-of-commute facilities are also exceptional with a generous provision of bike racks as well as showers. International House is located on the western edge of the St Katharine Docks Estate, overlooking Tower Bridge, the Tower of London and the Dock. Transport by Overground & Underground: 2 minutes’ walk from Tower Gateway DLR – 3 minutes’ walk from Tower Hill (Direct access to all main terminals: Waterloo, King’s Cross & London Bridge via Circle & District lines) – 7 minutes’ walk from Fenchurch Street (Mainline trains) – 8 minutes’ walk from Aldgate (Circle & Metropolitan lines) – 10 minutes’ walk from Monument (Circle & District lines) – 11 minutes’ walk from London Bridge (Northern & Jubilee lines). By Boat: Riverbus services to St Katharine’s Pier every 15 minutes – 2 minutes’ walk from Tower Pier with Riverbus service every 10 minutes. Exposed VRF air conditioning 3m floor to ceiling height Low profile feature LED lighting Metal tile raised floor New glazing Male and female showers, lockers and changing rooms 231 secure bicycle racks Impressive ‘active’ reception with breakout space and coffee shop Wiredscore Gold EPC: B (38)

71 Queen Victoria Street is an impressive modern office building prominently located on the south side of the Cannon Street, Queen Victoria Street crossing. The 3rd floor is either available in its existing partially fitted condition at a rent of £49.50 per sq. ft pax or in a refurbished Cat A condition at a rent of £57.50 per sq. ft pax. 71 Queen Victoria Street is ideally located just metres from Mansion House Station (District & Circle Lines) and a 3 minute walk from Cannon Street Station (Overground Services and District and Circle Lines). Additionally, St. Paul’s (Central Line) and Bank Stations (Central, DLR, Northern, Waterloo & City Lines) are both a 5 minute walk away. Splits available from 7,000 sq ft Available in refurbished Cat A condition or fully fitted by the Landlord 4 pipe fan coil air conditioning Fully raised floor 72 cycle spaces and 9 showers available Impressive double height ground floor reception with commissionaire Located opposite Mansion House tube station EPC B (42)

100 Cannon Street is a fully flexible and versatile office building on a prime street in the core of the City of London, offering 14,234 sq ft of available office space. The building offers occupiers a spacious and luminous environment across its different floors. 100 Cannon Street benefits from being set on a prominent corner position on the south side of Cannon Street. 100 Cannon Street is perfectly located for moving around the City, with Cannon Street station (National Rail, Circle and District Line) under a minutes’ walk away (100 metres) and the newest Bank Station entrance directly opposite (Central, Northern, Waterloo & City and DLR). The area is well served by a renowned amenity offering, including Bloomberg Arcade, One New Change, The Royal Exchange (all within a short walk), and a wide variety of shops and restaurants close by. Please note the 5th and 7th floor rents are guide rents. New Cat A on Level 1 including LED lighting / New landlord fit out on all other floors Manned reception 24 hour access Raised floor Two passenger lifts Bicycle storage & showers EPC C (51)

Devon House is a new, exciting office refurbishment by CDL, situated on the south side of the St Katharine Docks Estate. The Estate is located adjacent to Tower Bridge and overlooks the River Thames. It benefits from many local shops, restaurants and bars including Honest Burger, Cote, Ping Pong, Zizzi, Starbucks, CAU and The Dickens Inn. Transport by Overground & Underground: 2 minutes’ walk from Tower Gateway DLR – 3 minutes’ walk from Tower Hill (Direct access to all main terminals: Waterloo, King’s Cross & London Bridge via Circle & District lines) – 7 minutes’ walk from Fenchurch Street (Mainline trains) – 8 minutes’ walk from Aldgate (Circle & Metropolitan lines) – 10 minutes’ walk from Monument (Circle & District lines) – 11 minutes’ walk from London Bridge (Northern & Jubilee lines) or Liverpool Street (National Rail, Circle, Elizabeth, Hammersmith and City, Metropolitan and Central Lines.) By Boat: Riverbus services to St Katharine’s Pier every 15 minutes – 2 minutes’ walk from Tower Pier with Riverbus service every 10 minutes. The third floor will be available Q1 2026. 3.2-3.5m office ceiling heights Part of a vibrant waterside community Stiff + Trevillion designed reception with agile working area and access to riverside courtyard 21 showers & 190 lockers 97 bike spaces EPC: B (50)

10 Fleet Place is a high quality, office development which forms part of the successful Fleet Place Estate. The current refurbishment includes a re-imagined reception, providing a striking new arrival experience, brand-new best in class end of commute facilities and a contemporary Category A finish being delivered to the 6th floor. Please note the internal images of the office floors are not 6th floor but a representative floor. Transport Information 30 seconds’ cycle from Cycleway C6 (Bike) 2 minutes’ walk from City Thameslink (Overground) 6 minutes’ walk from St Paul’s (Central Line) Newly refurbished Powerful VAV air conditioning Contemporary metal tile suspended ceiling Feature slat ceiling finish to lift exists Efficient LED lighting 2.7m+ floor to ceiling heights Fully raised floors New hotel-style end of commute facilities Reception reinvigorated to deliver an impressive arrival experience Dual backup generators EPC: B

displayAddress: The Scalpel, 52 Lime Street London EC3
detailedDescription: This newly refurbished office on the 27th floor has been fully fitted comprising 76 desks, 7 meeting rooms of varying sizes, and a spacious breakout area. The stunning views of London’s skyline make it an inspiring place to work. The Scalpel is a landmark building with a BREEAM rating of ‘excellent’. The building consists of a prominent triple-height manned reception , 24/7 security and state of the art end of trip facilities. The building also benefits from a premium gym offering by RebelGym. Set on the corner of Leadenhall and Lime street, the tower provides an unparalleled HQ location in the heart of the City cluster with easy access to the rest of the city. Nearby stations include, Bank, Liverpool Street, Aldgate, Cannon Street, Fenchurch Street and Monument. New Landlord Cat A+ fit out 76 desks 7 Meeting Rooms BREEAM ‘Excellent’ Triple-height Reception 396 Cycle spaces & 40 showers Fantastic views of the City EPC B (28)

Designed under the mantra ‘ready to work’, the floors are delivered with a high quality landlord ‘plug and play’ fit out installed. 7 Bishopsgate is attractively located between the arterial transport hubs of Bank and Liverpool Street, offering unrivalled connectivity to both the City and wider London. The local amenity offering is also exceptional with the established luxury retail of the Royal Exchange / Cheapside / Leadenhall Market and food and beverage offering at the Broadgate Estate, are all within a short walk. New LED lighting Air Conditioning 2.7m floor to ceiling height 3 x 13 person lifts and 1 x 8 person lift serving all floors Refurbished and secure bike racks and showers Impressive double height marble reception EPC: C (51)

32-38 Saffron Hill is an ex warehouse that offers the perfect blend of modern design, strategic location, and unmatched amenities, this EC1 workspace is tailored to meet the unique needs of a dynamic business. The building is a two minute walk from Farringdon Station, which benefits from the Elizabeth, Metropolitan, Circle, and Hammersmith & City lines. CAT A+ LED strip lighting Former warehouse Raised floors Lift access Demised WCs and showers Fitted kitchen Meeting Rooms EPC: C (63)

displayAddress: Knightrider House, 2 Knightrider Court, London EC4V 5AR London EC4
detailedDescription: Knightrider House is a well known self contained building yards south of St Pauls. The offices are on 1st to 4th floors with extra Lower Ground space if required. The Ground Floor houses a coffee / pasta shop. Building only available as a whole. Knightrider House is located just south of St Paul’s in the pedestrian walkway which crosses Queen Victoria Street and leads to the Millennium Bridge. The building is close to the retail amenities of One New Change, Paternoster Square, Cheapside and Bow Lane. Excellent local transport links include St Paul’s, Blackfriars and City Thames Link, Mansion House and Cannon Street Stations. Refurbished offices and entrance hall VRF air conditioning Metal tile ceiling with LED lighting Shower Lift Building only available as a whole EPC: B (44)

A prestigious office building developed in 2018 with floor to ceiling glazing providing outstanding levels of natural light. The building achieved BREEAM Excellent and benefits from a green roof. The building has two passenger lifts and tenants benefit from a welcoming manned reception. Level 4 benefits from its own private terrace and high quality fit out. 17 St Swithin’s Lane provides the ideal “City-perfect” office location: a historic address in the heart of London’s financial district, with excellent transport connectivity and a rich amenity environment that supports both productivity and lifestyle. For businesses looking to signal prestige, access a deep talent pool, and provide a magnet location for staff and clients alike, this property offers a compelling value proposition. * Bank Station – a 2–3 minute walk, providing quick links via the Central, Northern, Circle, District, Waterloo & City lines, plus the DLR. * Cannon Street Station – less than 200 metres away, offering National Rail services alongside the Circle & District lines. * Fast, simple routes to the West End, King’s Cross, London Bridge, Canary Wharf, and London City Airport. New Plug & play fit out (24 desks, 1 x 12 pp boardroom, 2 x 6 pp meeting rooms, tea point / break out area, 2 x phone booths) Air conditioning / Raised floors Private terrace Manned reception & 24/7 access Bicycle storage / Showers / Lockers BREEAM Excellent / EPC A (25)

19-21 Hatton Garden offers a variety of fully fitted units available on an all inclusive or fully managed basis. The building benefits from communal meeting rooms and an impressive listed entrance. Hatton Garden is a highly sought after location. The building is a 4 minute walk from Farringdon Station, which benefits from the Elizabeth, Metropolitan, Circle, and Hammersmith & City lines. It is also a three minute walk from Chancery Lane Station which benefits from the Central line. Fully fitted Great natural light Parquet flooring Central EC1 location 3 minute walk to Farringdon Station EPC C (69)

displayAddress: Jameson House, 146-148 Clerkenwell Road London EC1
detailedDescription: Newly fully fitted, high quality, offices in the heart of Clerkenwell. The building is prominently positioned and enjoys excellent connectivity, just moments from Farringdon Station. The surrounding area offers an exceptional mix of amenities, including an array of popular pubs, acclaimed restaurants, and artisan coffee shops. Farringdon Underground Station – 5 minutes walk. Cat B Excellent connectivity Newly refurbished Air conditioning EPC: C (64)

The available offices have been comprehensively refurbished and offered in grade A CAT B fully fitted condition. The offices include break out spaces and a remodelled reception area. The building is a three minute walk from Farringdon Station, which offers a connection to the Elizabeth, Metropolitan, Circle, and Hammersmith & City lines. It is also a three minute walk from Chancery Lane Station which benefits from access to the Central line. Three minute walk to Farringdon Station Shower facilities Air conditioning LED lighting Remodelled reception Fitted & unfitted offices available EPC: TBC

displayAddress: The Binary, 27 Copperfield Street London SE1
detailedDescription: In the heart of Southwark, you’ll find The Binary, a distinctive warehouse conversion by the multi-award-winning developer Fabrix Capital. The part first floor offers 1,307 square feet of fully furnished and fitted office space. The building features a communal courtyard accessible from the main reception. Whether your hosting corporate events or enjoying a lunchtime catch-up, the landscaped courtyard has been designed for a variety of occasions. Additional building amenities include secure bike storage, shower facilities, and a passenger lift. The building boasts excellent transport links with major train stations Waterloo and London Bridge, both approximately a 10-minute walk away. Southwark Underground Station offering access to the Jubilee Line is also a short walk away. Local occupiers enjoy a wealth of dining, shopping, and leisure options, including the famous Borough Market and Flat Iron Square to name a few. Fully fitted & furnished Communal courtyard Secure bike racks & showers Individual heating and cooling control LED lighting High-speed fibre optic broadband Well located close to London Bridge & Waterloo EPC: B (26)

60 Cheapside is a high quality building which offers a variety of contemporary office units in a prominent City Core location, situated between Bank and St Paul’s Underground stations. With a feature glass entrance, manned reception and contemporary finishes 60 Cheapside is well placed to offer stylish office accommodation to discerning occupiers. 4th floor north and 1st floor south are fully fitted and furnished to a high standard. A managed solution is also available. Located at the intersection of the historic and intimate Bow Lane with bustling Cheapside and thriving public realm. Local amenities include high end retail and restaurants at One New Change, The NED, Bow Lane and Bloomberg’s headquarters amongst others. The building will appeal to a variety of occupiers who are seeking exciting City core location with exceptional transport links. Mansion House, St Paul’s and Bank stations are all within close walking proximity giving access to 6 separate Underground lines. Cannon Street and Blackfriars mainline stations are both within a 7 min walk. 4th north: Fully fitted with a tea point, a meeting area, 12 sit/stand desks and 6 person collaborative area 1st south: Fitted with a boardroom and a tea point. Open plan area for up to 18 desks Air conditioning with on floor control / Raised floors / LED lighting Manned reception 2 passenger lifts Showers Dedicated fibre distribution point installed EPC: C (55)

5 St. Helen’s Place is located within a private estate, accessed from Bishopsgate through a manned and gated portico with 24/7 access. The 6th floor offices offer an occupier the opportunity to acquire a fitted out office in a prime City core location on flexible terms direct from the landlord, the Leathersellers Livery Company. The building is located in the heart of the City’s Tower Cluster, with Lloyd’s of London, Bank, Leadenhall Market and The Royal Exchange easily accessible. Liverpool Street, Monument and Cannon Street stations are all within a short walk away, providing Mainline, Underground, and Elizabeth Line services. Available January 2026 Fully fitted and to be furnished with a meeting room / exec office and 8 desks High quality kitchenette, raised access floor and LED lighting Secure bike storage and shower facilities on the estate Manned reception 24/7 access Resident Landlord EPC B

Positioned in a prime city core location, this third-floor office combines character and convenience, accessed via a striking grand staircase or a modern passenger lift. The suite extends to 843 sq ft and comes with a high-quality CAT A+ fit-out, including a private meeting room, fitted kitchen, and demised WC. The space is ready to go with pre-installed CAT 6 cabling, ensuring seamless connectivity from day one. Occupiers also benefit from excellent on-site amenities, with secure bike storage and shower facilities available in the basement. The office can be taken in its current fitted condition, or the landlord can provide a fully bespoke fit-out tailored to individual business requirements. The property is located on St Swithin’s Lane, perfectly positioned between Bank and Cannon Street stations. This prime location is moments from Bank Junction and the Royal Exchange Shopping Centre, offering access to a wide variety of upscale shops, restaurants, and cafés. A strong mix of nearby bars and dining options makes this one of the most vibrant parts of the City. Popular destinations such as St Swithin’s Wine Bar, The Don, City Social, 14 Hills, The Ned Hotel, and Cecconi’s are all within easy reach. Kitchen Meeting room Air conditioning End of trip facilities Ornate staircase Demised WC’s 24/7 Access Passenger Lift EPC: B (48)

Eighty Cheapside offers contemporary office space in a prime City location. It boasts a striking, refurbished double-height reception area and premium end-of-journey amenities. The office is fully furnished and fitted, providing 72 desks, several meeting rooms, a boardroom, and a spacious breakout area. Eighty Cheapside is in an excellent City location with good access to the City’s well regarded transport network – in particular Bank and Cannon Street stations, with Moorgate (Elizabeth Line) and Mansion House (District and Circle) a manageable walk away. The area is well served for retail, hospitality and leisure with offers including The Ned, The Royal Exchange, The Bloomberg Arcade, Cheapside, Bow Lane and Leadenhall Market. A choice of high-quality office suites is now available, offering flexibility to occupy individually or combine for larger requirements. First Floor East (1,485 sq ft): Fully fitted and furnished, complete with a brand-new kitchen. First Floor West (1,750 sq ft): Newly refurbished, featuring 2 private meeting rooms and a modern kitchenette. Fourth Floor (3,263 sq ft): A brand-new, fully fitted and furnished workspace, designed with 32 desks, 3 meeting rooms, and breakout areas. Each suite has been finished to a contemporary standard, with new flooring, integrated kitchen facilities, and meeting rooms ready for use. For occupiers seeking something more tailored, the landlord is open to delivering a bespoke fit-out to match specific business needs. The building further benefits from a welcoming managed reception, secure bike storage, and shower facilities. For added flexibility, managed workspace solutions are available through Base Real Estate, giving businesses the option to scale with ease. Norton Folgate is home to a mix of residential buildings, shops, restaurants, and businesses. Liverpool Street Station is a five minute walk and provides access to National Rail services, including trains to destinations across England, as well as the London Underground’s Elizabeth, Central, Circle, Hammersmith & City, and Metropolitan lines. Excellent location Manned reception High quality end of trip facilities Meeting room Kitchenette Fitted Exposed brickwork EPC C (67)

Ivory House is a characterful, converted warehouse. It provides the ideal location for an occupier looking for offices in a waterside location. The 1st floor office is newly available and provides bright, efficient, fitted space. The building has period features and the offices are accessed via a private entrance. The estate boasts an excellent range of restaurants, coffee shops and bars. Showers, bike storage, Brompton lockers and car parking are available. The 2nd floor is available in a refurbished fitted specification, complete with a kitchen and a private meeting room, providing an efficient plug-and-play solution for occupiers. The reception has recently been transformed through an extensive refurbishment, creating a contemporary and welcoming arrival experience. The building also contains secure bike storage and high-quality shower facilities. Situated in the heart of the City’s insurance district and just a short walk from the Lloyd’s Building, 80 Leadenhall enjoys outstanding connectivity with Liverpool Street, Fenchurch Street, Aldgate, Monument, and Bank stations all within easy reach. The building is perfectly positioned for occupiers to take advantage of the rich variety of amenities in EC3. Leadenhall Market, with its historic arcades, offers an excellent choice of pubs, wine bars, and restaurants, while the surrounding streets provide everything from grab-and-go lunch spots to fine dining. The area also benefits from a wide range of shops, gyms, and cafés. Refurbished entrance 2 x Passenger lifts 24/7 Access Kitchen Boardroom Manned reception End of trip facilities 5 min walk to Lloyds EPC B (33)

displayAddress: Aldermary House, 10-15 Queen Street London EC4

Mansion House, Bank and Cannon Street underground stations and Cannon Street mainline station are all within a short walk. Newly refurbished, manned reception Newly refurbished showers and cycle storage Private gym facility in the basement EPC: B (43-46)

108 Cannon Street is a Grade A office building in the City of London. The building has been extensively refurbished to provide flexible, sustainable, and tenant-friendly environments. The 7th floor tenant can offer flexible subleases until December 2031. – Cannon Street (District & Circle) – 1 min walk – Bank (Central, Northern, Waterloo & City, DLR) – 1 min walk – Mansion House (District & Circle) – 5 min walk – Monument (Circle & District) – 6 min walk Shared roof terrace on Level 8 A stylish reception with striking lighting, greenery, and flexible spaces for work or relaxation awaits at 108 Cannon Street High efficiency LED lighting with integral dimming & presence detection Ground floor coffee provision with Scanomat’s TopBrewer Building App EPC: B (31)

Ignite your creativity in the heart of London’s latest tech and media district. This ex warehouse office, moments away from Old Street Tube, puts you at the epicenter of innovation, surrounded by start-ups, tech giants, and artistic inspiration. The offices can be delivered furnished, if required, subject to adjustment of the managed monthly cost. Vestry Street is a five minute walk from Old Street Station connecting you with the Northern Line & National Rail Services. There are also a multitude of bus and cycle routes. Former warehouse / Exposed brickwork Excellent natural light LED strip lighting CAT A or fitted spaces Tech City: A vibrant ecosystem Flexible, efficient space Comprehensive end of commute facilities EPC: E (107)

displayAddress: 11-15 St Mary at Hill London EC3
detailedDescription: 11-15 St Mary at Hill is a modern office building located in London’s historic EC3 district, specifically within the Billingsgate Ward of the City of London. The property comprises lower ground, ground, and four uppers, offering a total area of approximately 5,348 sq ft. With 24 hour access, bike rack storage, and separate WC’s on each floor, this building offers great amenities for each of its tenants. The building is located on the west side of St Mary at Hill which runs between Eastcheap to the north and Lower Thames Street to the south. Monument & Tower Hill underground stations are equidistant from the building giving access to the District & Circle lines. The building is also within close walking distance from Bank underground station (Central, Northern and Waterloo & City). 6-minute walk to new Bank Station entrance Newly fully-fitted and non-fitted options 6 Person passenger lift Contemporary entrance with 24 hour access New Landlord CAT B option Fully accessible raised floor Newly fitted cycle storage EPC B (27)

A prestigious office building developed in 2018 with floor to ceiling glazing providing outstanding levels of natural light. The building achieved BREEAM Excellent and benefits from a green roof. The building has two passenger lifts and tenants benefit from a welcoming manned reception. Level 4 benefits from its own private terrace and high quality fit out. 17 St Swithin’s Lane provides the ideal “City-perfect” office location: a historic address in the heart of London’s financial district, with excellent transport connectivity and a rich amenity environment that supports both productivity and lifestyle. For businesses looking to signal prestige, access a deep talent pool, and provide a magnet location for staff and clients alike, this property offers a compelling value proposition. * Bank Station – a 2–3 minute walk, providing quick links via the Central, Northern, Circle, District, Waterloo & City lines, plus the DLR. * Cannon Street Station – less than 200 metres away, offering National Rail services alongside the Circle & District lines. * Fast, simple routes to the West End, King’s Cross, London Bridge, Canary Wharf, and London City Airport. New Plug & play fit out (24 desks, 1 x 12 pp boardroom, 2 x 6 pp meeting rooms, tea point / break out area, 2 x phone booths) Air conditioning / Raised floors Private terrace Manned reception & 24/7 access Bicycle storage / Showers / Lockers BREEAM Excellent / EPC A (25)

19-21 Hatton Garden offers a variety of fully fitted units available on an all inclusive or fully managed basis. The building benefits from communal meeting rooms and an impressive listed entrance. Hatton Garden is a highly sought after location. The building is a 4 minute walk from Farringdon Station, which benefits from the Elizabeth, Metropolitan, Circle, and Hammersmith & City lines. It is also a three minute walk from Chancery Lane Station which benefits from the Central line. Fully fitted Great natural light Parquet flooring Central EC1 location 3 minute walk to Farringdon Station EPC C (69)

displayAddress: Jameson House, 146-148 Clerkenwell Road London EC1
detailedDescription: Newly fully fitted, high quality, offices in the heart of Clerkenwell. The building is prominently positioned and enjoys excellent connectivity, just moments from Farringdon Station. The surrounding area offers an exceptional mix of amenities, including an array of popular pubs, acclaimed restaurants, and artisan coffee shops. Farringdon Underground Station – 5 minutes walk. Cat B Excellent connectivity Newly refurbished Air conditioning EPC: C (64)

The available offices have been comprehensively refurbished and offered in grade A CAT B fully fitted condition. The offices include break out spaces and a remodelled reception area. The building is a three minute walk from Farringdon Station, which offers a connection to the Elizabeth, Metropolitan, Circle, and Hammersmith & City lines. It is also a three minute walk from Chancery Lane Station which benefits from access to the Central line. Three minute walk to Farringdon Station Shower facilities Air conditioning LED lighting Remodelled reception Fitted & unfitted offices available EPC: TBC

displayAddress: The Binary, 27 Copperfield Street London SE1
detailedDescription: In the heart of Southwark, you’ll find The Binary, a distinctive warehouse conversion by the multi-award-winning developer Fabrix Capital. The part first floor offers 1,307 square feet of fully furnished and fitted office space. The building features a communal courtyard accessible from the main reception. Whether your hosting corporate events or enjoying a lunchtime catch-up, the landscaped courtyard has been designed for a variety of occasions. Additional building amenities include secure bike storage, shower facilities, and a passenger lift. The building boasts excellent transport links with major train stations Waterloo and London Bridge, both approximately a 10-minute walk away. Southwark Underground Station offering access to the Jubilee Line is also a short walk away. Local occupiers enjoy a wealth of dining, shopping, and leisure options, including the famous Borough Market and Flat Iron Square to name a few. Fully fitted & furnished Communal courtyard Secure bike racks & showers Individual heating and cooling control LED lighting High-speed fibre optic broadband Well located close to London Bridge & Waterloo EPC: B (26)

60 Cheapside is a high quality building which offers a variety of contemporary office units in a prominent City Core location, situated between Bank and St Paul’s Underground stations. With a feature glass entrance, manned reception and contemporary finishes 60 Cheapside is well placed to offer stylish office accommodation to discerning occupiers. 4th floor north and 1st floor south are fully fitted and furnished to a high standard. A managed solution is also available. Located at the intersection of the historic and intimate Bow Lane with bustling Cheapside and thriving public realm. Local amenities include high end retail and restaurants at One New Change, The NED, Bow Lane and Bloomberg’s headquarters amongst others. The building will appeal to a variety of occupiers who are seeking exciting City core location with exceptional transport links. Mansion House, St Paul’s and Bank stations are all within close walking proximity giving access to 6 separate Underground lines. Cannon Street and Blackfriars mainline stations are both within a 7 min walk. 4th north: Fully fitted with a tea point, a meeting area, 12 sit/stand desks and 6 person collaborative area 1st south: Fitted with a boardroom and a tea point. Open plan area for up to 18 desks Air conditioning with on floor control / Raised floors / LED lighting Manned reception 2 passenger lifts Showers Dedicated fibre distribution point installed EPC: C (55)

5 St. Helen’s Place is located within a private estate, accessed from Bishopsgate through a manned and gated portico with 24/7 access. The 6th floor offices offer an occupier the opportunity to acquire a fitted out office in a prime City core location on flexible terms direct from the landlord, the Leathersellers Livery Company. The building is located in the heart of the City’s Tower Cluster, with Lloyd’s of London, Bank, Leadenhall Market and The Royal Exchange easily accessible. Liverpool Street, Monument and Cannon Street stations are all within a short walk away, providing Mainline, Underground, and Elizabeth Line services. Available January 2026 Fully fitted and to be furnished with a meeting room / exec office and 8 desks High quality kitchenette, raised access floor and LED lighting Secure bike storage and shower facilities on the estate Manned reception 24/7 access Resident Landlord EPC B
